entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
